apps.id.verification.verificationRequire: To receive permission to publish the app to this stand, you must pass additional verification, which includes testing the app, entering into a partnership agreement, and additional verification of information about the app.

After clicking the «{action}» button, you will be contacted by our specialist on the phone number specified during registration, or in the partner chat in case of availability. You will be able to track the status of verification on this page.

apps.b2c.sections.info.title: Info
apps.b2c.sections.info.icons.subtitle: App icons
Used in to display on the home screen of the resident's mobile app. Must be in {format} format, have a size of {size} pixels, and adhere to the following color palette: {mainColor} as the primary color and {secondaryColor} as the secondary color.
To see examples of icons along with a style guide, check out our {link}.
apps.b2c.sections.info.icons.warning.des: In case of non-compliance with the specified requirements, the application will not be allowed before subsequent publication on the product environment, previously published application may be hidden completely or have the icon removed without prior notice.

The link to which the user will be redirected after successful authorization
